description:
It’s been officially confirmed that AMC Networks has canceled one of their fan-favorite shows, sadly only after airing one season of the series on their platform. The series itself was actually a follow-up of another popular series which initially aired on BBC. For this particular follow-up series on AMC, however, it seems to have lacked [...]

The post AMC Cancels Fan-Favorite Series After One Season appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: AMC Cancels Fan-Favorite Series After One Season
